page.title: 09Home Life.
page.content: {HOME LIFE}- On Saturday at 6.45 a.m. my parents cook breakfast. Between 9 a.m. and 12 noon my friend and I go swimmimg with the Vicar. Then we have family lunch at home -{Michelle.} On Saturday, my dad goes to work at 7 a.m. and returns at 12 noon when we watch TV. My mum gets up at 8.30 a.m. and in the afternoon our whole family goes to the market -{Shalish.} On Saturday, my dad wakes at 4 a.m. and goes to work at 7. My brother goes to work at 8. Then I get up for my breakfast and wait for my mum, a staff nurse to come home -{Andrew.} {RELIGION}- I am a Hindu and I pray at home in our home-made temple every day. I make a lamp with purified butter and cotton wool. I also light joss-sticks that smell nice -{Sailesh. {E GROUP - ST. JAMES' SCHOOL, ASHTON {
